mainText:
Steve's Friends and Family,

Thank you for allowing Steve to invent great products.  He changed my life and my business.  Enabled me to do things other companies in my line of work weren't doing.  He helped me by providing a great OS to run quickbooks on to keep track of my business.  Please continue to make us proud and so that I can oooo and ahhhh about every product announcement.  Thanks again for sharing your life with me.
author: Anonymous
